english.segment1: Above all powers, above all kings. Above all nature and all created things. Above all wisdom and all the ways of man. You were here before the world began
english.segment2: Above all kingdoms, above all thrones. Above all wonders the world has ever known. Above all wealth and treasures of the earth. There's no way to measure what You're worth
english.segment3: Crucified. Laid behind the stone. You lived to die, rejected and alone. Like a rose trampled on the ground. You took the fall and thought of me. Above all
english.segment4: Above all powers, above all kings. Above all nature and all created things. Above all wisdom and all the ways of man. You were here before the world began
english.segment5: Above all kingdoms, above all thrones. Above all wonders the world has ever known. Above all wealth and treasures of the earth. There's no way to measure what You're worth
english.segment6: Crucified. Laid behind the stone. You lived to die, rejected and alone. Like a rose trampled on the ground. You took the fall and thought of me
english.segment7: Crucified. Laid behind the stone. You lived to die, rejected and alone. Like a rose trampled on the ground. You took the fall and thought of me. Above all
english.segment8: Evermore, You thought of me. Thought of me. Jesus, You thought of me. Thought of me
